header.title: megaco_codec_meas

erlref.modulesummary: A simple Megaco codec measurement tool.

description.p: This module implements a simple Megaco codec measurement tool.
Results are written to file (Excel-compatible text files) and on stdout.

note.p: This module is not included in the runtime part of the application.

desc.p: Runs the measurement on all the official codecs: pretty, compact, ber, per, and erlang.
